testsuite.name: order_processor

testcase.name: order_processor Should have all the method placeOrder in the class
testcase.classname: Should have all the method placeOrder in the class

testcase.name: order_processor Should emit the event PROCESSING_STARTED when placeOrder is called
testcase.classname: Should emit the event PROCESSING_STARTED when placeOrder is called

testcase.name: order_processor Should emit the PROCESSING_FAILED if line items are empty
testcase.classname: Should emit the PROCESSING_FAILED if line items are empty

testcase.name: order_processor Should emit the PROCESSING_FAILED if any of the line items do not meet the stock requirements
testcase.classname: Should emit the PROCESSING_FAILED if any of the line items do not meet the stock requirements

testcase.name: order_processor Should emit the PROCESSING_SUCCESS if all the validations pass
testcase.classname: Should emit the PROCESSING_SUCCESS if all the validations pass

testcase.name: order_processor Should emit the PROCESSING_SUCCESS if all the validations pass for multiple orders
testcase.classname: Should emit the PROCESSING_SUCCESS if all the validations pass for multiple orders
